text: Nomuli, gei Jesus ga helekai gi digau dogologo, “E hai behee? Au tangada dagahi haganoho dela goodou e lloomoi e kumi Au, ge gaamai godou hulumanu dauwa, mono mee haga mamaawa dangada? Nia laangi huogodoo Au nogo noho i lodo di Hale Daumaha, e haihai agu agoago, gei goodou digi kumidia Au.26.55 Luke 19.47; 21.37
